Title: Requires the department to draft guidelines for the transition of patients from substances with a high risk of addiction to those with a low risk
Summary: Requires the department to draft guidelines for the transition of patients from substances with a high risk of addiction to those with a low risk.
LawCode: Add ยง3351-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to creating medicinal guidelines to aid in the administration of prescription drugs to patients with high risks of addiction
